#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int reverse(int num)
{
  int rev=0,dig=0;
  while(num!=0)
  {
   dig=num%10;
   rev=rev*10+dig;
   num/=10;
  }
return rev;
}

int main()
{
 int n,c,t;
 cin>>t;
 while(t--)
 {
  cin>>n;
  c=0;
  while(reverse(n)!=n)
  {
   n+=reverse(n);
   c++;
  }
  cout<<c<<" "<<n<<endl;

}
return 0;
}
